message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business.  While I can't disclose details about its exact nature just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it holds even greater potential for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a significant opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. Let me know if you're interested in discussing it further.
